channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Seamless Donations: A Platform for Global Fundraising and Rebuilding using Stripe and PayPal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Seamless Donations: A Platform for Global Fundraising and Rebuilding using Stripe and PayPal

item.title: CVE-2022-1610|2024-08-03T00:10:03.683Z -- unknown -- seamless%20donations%3A%20a%20platform%20for%20global%20fundraising%20and%20rebuilding%20using%20stripe%20and%20paypal
item.description: The Seamless Donations WordPress plugin before 5.1.9 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
